text: [Vspomni, Mukhammad,] kak Allakh vselil v serdtsa Poslannika Svoyego i veruyushchikh uspokoyeniye i daroval im Slovo okhrannoye (t. ye. shakhadu), togda kak [po-prezhnemu] nevernyye leleyali v svoikh serdtsakh yarost' vremen dzhakhiliyyi. Veruyushchiye byli dostoyneye i boleye [nevernykh] zasluzhili togo, [chtoby vnimat' Yego slovu]. A Allakh vedayet obo vsem sushchem
